snippet: Texas ended a seven-game losing streak and pulled even with the Tampa Bay Rays at the top of the American League wild-card race.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers beat Tampa Bay Rays, 7-1, breaking seven-game losing streak; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Texas ended a seven-game losing streak and pulled even with the Tampa Bay Rays at the top of the American League wild-card race.

headline.main: Rangers End Skid and Tie the Rays
headline.print_headline: Rangers End Skid And Tie The Rays
